title: Improved Model Pipeline & Feature Engineering
content: Added demographic features: median income, poverty rate, race percentages.
Built ZIP lookup system for Google restaurants.
Improved preprocessing and missing value handling.

title: Google Places Integration (Nearby Restaurants Mode)
content: Normalized Google restaurant features for the ML model.
Implemented distance matching for clicking Google markers.

title: Map Rendering & Session-State Fix
content: Eliminated rerender loops caused by state conflicts.
